title: Garry's chilli con carne
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 medium onion, roughly chopped', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '450g (1 lb) minced beef steak', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon vinegar', '1 beef stock pot or stock cube', '200ml water', '1 small tin red kidney beans. drained and rinsed']
